posts.post_content:
I still need one or more poses of the following Detroit N172 players:

Lady Baldwin
Count Campau
Pete Conway
Charlie Getzien
Barney Gilligan
Mike Goodfellow
John McGlone
Frank Scheibeck
Deacon White

I will pay or trade handsomely for poses I still need.

I'm also always looking to grow my N173 & N175 Detroit collection.  Please let me know what you might have (even if you don't "think" you would like to part with it :) )
Bump, in attempt to see if I can get lucky like my friend Joe Maples and grow the collection.
Not so bad if someone else bumps it

Hey, I'll bump this thread, I need these cards too. !!!  ;)

Joe M.

Three can play at this bumping party! 

Joe and Joe both have multiple Scheibecks and I need only one! :D

[quote name="kkkkandp" post=1219077]Three can play at this bumping party! 

Joe and Joe both have multiple Scheibecks and I need only one! :D[/QUOTE]

Its all about scope ;), your massive collection requires one, but my small narrow focus requires more than one.  I'll bet you pennies on the dollar that you obtain one before I finish all the poses :)
